actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT CONCAT('  (',coalesce(TK.COUNT,0),')',AG.agent_level,' - ',AG.AGENT_NAME,'-',AG.AGENT_LANGUAGES,'-' ,AG.area_zone,' -LCT-',tkt.closed_time) AS LABEL , AG.AGENT_id AS VALUE 
FROM agent AS AG 
LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(AGENT_ID) AS COUNT, AGENT_ID FROM TICKET WHERE TICKET_STATUS IN ('ASSIGNED','PICKED') AND created_time>=current_date GROUP BY AGENT_ID) AS TK ON TK.AGENT_ID=AG.AGENT_ID
left join (select to_char(max(closed_time),'DD/MM/YY HH:MI:SS')  as closed_time, agent_id from ticket group by agent_id) as tkt on tkt.agent_id=ag.agent_id
where AG.agent_status!='INACTIVE' AND 
(CASE WHEN {{project_dd.selectedOptionValue}}='ERP' then AG.agent_projects='SUPPORT' when {{project_dd.selectedOptionValue}}='MIGRATION' then AG.agent_projects='MIGRATION' else AG.agent_projects='SUCCESS' end)
and deleted=false
ORDER BY (case when ag.agent_id={{retailer_data.data[0].agent_id}} then -1 else coalesce(TK.COUNT,0) end ) asc;
